markdownRemark.excerpt: A Splunk customer wrote a utility to help translate old sourcetype to new source/sourcetype with visual review and a nice workflow for helping the admin applyâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
A Splunk customer wrote a utility to help translate old sourcetype to new source/sourcetype with visual review and a nice workflow for helping the admin apply changes. Worth checking out and adding to your utility belt.

https://github.com/dstaulcu/SplunkKOHelper

frontmatter.title: SecKit for Splunk TA Windows is out
Is your LDAP Slow? It might make your Splunk Slow
